spec.title: A Method for Writing Testable Conformance Requirements

algorithms.html:
In the case the user agent is asked to ignore an [XML] element
or node, a user agent:

steps.html: Stops processing the current element, ignoring all of the elementâ€˜s attributes and child nodes (if any), and proceed to the next element in the elements list.
Make a record that it has attempted to process an element of that type.
